sentences.en: Concrete is liable to crack in very cold weather.
sentences.cn: 在严寒的天气条件下混凝土可能会开裂。

sentences.en: Crack is part of a battery of drugs used by addicts.
sentences.cn: 强效可卡因是瘾君子们吸食的众多毒品之一。

sentences.en: Crack is the most addictive drug on the market.
sentences.cn: 强效纯可卡因是市面上最容易让人上瘾的毒品。

sentences.en: crack up a plane; crack up a boat.
sentences.cn: 撞毁了一架飞机；撞沉了一条船

sentences.en: cracked up on the expressway.
sentences.cn: 在高速公路上撞车了

sentences.en: Dennis rubbed his hands together and cracked his knuckles .
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯搓着双手，把指关节弄得咯咯响。

sentences.en: Dennis rubbed his hands together and cracked his knuckles.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯搓着双手，把指关节弄得咯咯响。

sentences.en: Don’t put boiling water in the glass or it will crack.
sentences.cn: 不要把沸水倒进这个玻璃杯里，否则它会破裂的。

sentences.en: Drug experts say it could spell the end of the crack epidemic.
sentences.cn: 禁毒专家说它可能会结束强效可卡因吸食泛滥的局面。

sentences.en: Getting out there is in many ways the hardest nut to crack.
sentences.cn: 从很多方面来说，出去交际是最难以做到的事了。

sentences.en: He cracked a couple of eggs into a pan.
sentences.cn: 他往平底锅里打了几个鸡蛋。

sentences.en: He cracked his whip and galloped off.
sentences.cn: 他甩了个响鞭策马而去。

sentences.en: He hammered the wedge into the crack in the stone.
sentences.cn: 他用锤子把楔子砸入石缝里。

sentences.en: He picked up a piece of rock and cracked it in half.
sentences.cn: 他捡起一块石头，把它击碎成两半。

sentences.en: He was simply not the genius he was cracked up to be.
sentences.cn: 他不象人们所赞扬的那样是个天才

sentences.en: Her veneer of politeness began to crack.
sentences.cn: 她那彬彬有礼的伪装开始露馅儿了。

sentences.en: In severe cases, the skin can crack and weep.
sentences.cn: 在恶劣的条件下，皮肤可能会开裂并流脓。

sentences.en: individuals who feel that they have not had a fair crack of the whip.
sentences.cn: 感觉没有公平机会的个人。

sentences.en: Kathryn had seen him through a crack in the curtains.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳透过窗帘缝看见了他。

sentences.en: life on tour is not as glamorous as it's cracked up to be.
sentences.cn: 旅行生活并不像所吹嘘的那样迷人。

sentences.en: Living in this goldfish bowl of publicity would crack the strongest marriage.
sentences.cn: 生活在这种全无隐私可言的环境之下，最牢固的婚姻也会破裂。

sentences.en: most tickets have been snapped up, so get cracking if you want one.
sentences.cn: 大部分票都被一抢而空了，想要的话得赶快行动了。

sentences.en: really cracked up when I heard that joke.
sentences.cn: 听到那个笑话我真想大笑

sentences.en: She fell and cracked a bone in her leg.
sentences.cn: 她摔了一跤，结果一根腿骨骨折。

sentences.en: She opened the door a crack and peeped into the room.
sentences.cn: 她把门打开一条缝，往房间里偷看。

sentences.en: She's calm and strong, and she is just not going to crack.
sentences.cn: 她镇定而且坚强，绝不会垮掉。

sentences.en: Suddenly there was a loud crack and glass flew into the car.
sentences.cn: 突然发出一声巨大的爆裂声，玻璃碎片飞进了车里。

sentences.en: The plate had a crack in it.
sentences.cn: 盘子上有一道裂纹。

sentences.en: The police cracked down on speeding.
sentences.cn: 警察取缔超速行车

sentences.en: The vacuum flask has a strong casing, which won't crack or chip.
sentences.cn: 这种热水瓶瓶身坚固，不易断裂破碎。

sentences.en: There was a deep crack in the ceiling above him.
sentences.cn: 在他头顶的天花板上有一道很深的裂缝。

sentences.en: There was a sharp crack as the branch broke off.
sentences.cn: 树枝咔嚓一声折断了。

sentences.en: There's a hairline crack in the rim of that jar.
sentences.cn: 那只罐子的口沿有条极细的裂缝。

sentences.en: Thunder cracked overhead.
sentences.cn: 雷声在头顶炸响。

sentences.en: we need to crack down hard on workplaces that break safety regulations.
sentences.cn: 我们必须严惩不守安全规则的工场。

sentences.en: we'll &B{crack on with} the second half of the job this month.
sentences.cn: 这个月我们要加快下半部分工作的进程。

words.tran_cn: 破裂的；声音嘶哑的；精神失常的
爆竹；饼干；胡桃钳；解密高手
猪油渣；脆皮；连续的爆裂声
破裂；崩溃（crack的过去分词）；发沙哑声；失败
发爆裂声；龟裂；充满活力（crackle的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 开瓶（尤指开葡萄酒的酒瓶）喝酒
严厉取缔：采取严厉措施来规定、抑制或约束
(非正式)采取严厉措施；严厉打击
裂纹长度；裂缝长度；裂隙长度
(英，非正式)尝试机会；参与机会
抗裂性；抗裂度；裂纹阻力
大笑：经历或使经历极大的快乐
(非正式)断定（指对某人某事某物的优点夸大地宣扬）
(北美)。 同 slip through the net （见 net）

trans.tran_cn: 缝隙，裂缝，噼啪声，尝试，笑话
trans.tran_en: a very narrow space between two things or two parts of something

trans.tran_cn: （使）破裂，裂开，砸开，重击，（使）发出爆裂声，（因压力而）崩溃，瓦解，变沙哑，开（玩笑），找到解决…的方法
trans.tran_en: to break or to make something break, either so that it gets lines on its surface, or so that it breaks into pieces

trans.tran_cn: 爆裂； 噼啪地响； 打， 击
trans.tran_en: to make a quick loud sound like the sound of something breaking, or to make something do this
